title: RT News - October 17, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: Britain's Prime Minister says he's secured a 'great new' Brexit deal with the European Union just two weeks before the deadline to leave the bloc. It will go behind before parliament in London on Saturday. Running battles in Barcelona for a third night as tens of thousands of protesters vent their anger over the jailing of nine Catalan independence leaders. RT releases more exclusive video from a former US military base in Syria, abandoned by Washington shortly before Turkey's offensive against the Kurds started.
description: Britain's Prime Minister says he's secured a 'great new' Brexit deal with the European Union just two weeks before the deadline to leave the bloc
